Package be.ac.ulg.montefiore.run.jadti

Interface Summary
LearningNode A learning node is a node with an associated learning set.
 

Class Summary
Attribute An abstract representation of an attribute.
AttributeSet This class holds an ordered set of attributes.
AttributeValue This class implements the value of an attribute.
DecisionTree This class implements a decision tree.
DecisionTreeBFIterator This class implements a breadth-first search over nodes of a tree.
DecisionTreeBuilder A builder of decision trees from a database.
Entropy A class holding entropy-related functions.
IdSymbolicAttribute A symbolic attribute where each attribute value is associated with an object, usually its name coded as a String.
Item An instance of this class holds the values of the attributes of an element of the learning/testing set.
ItemSet This class holds an ordered set of items.
KnownNumericalValue This class implements the value of a symbolic attribute.
KnownSymbolicValue This class implements the value of a symbolic attribute.
LeafNode A leaf node.
LearningDecisionTree A learning decision tree.
LearningLeafNode A leaf node implementing the LearningNode interface.
LearningOpenNode A open node implementing the LearningNode interface.
LearningTestNode A test node implementing the LearningNode interface.
Node A decision tree node.
NumericalAttribute This class implements a numerical attribute.
NumericalTest A test on a single numerical attribute.
NumericalValue This class implements the value of a numerical attribute.
OpenNode This class implements a 'open' node.
ScoreTestNode This class implements a testing node with an associated score value.
SimpleDecisionTreeBuilder A builder of decision trees from a database.
SymbolicAttribute A symbolic attribute.
SymbolicTest A test on a single symbolic attribute.
SymbolicValue This class implements the value of a symbolic attribute.
Test A test on a single attribute.
TestNode This class implements a testing node.
TestScore  
UnknownNumericalValue This class implements the value of a symbolic attribute.
UnknownSymbolicValue This class implements the value of a symbolic attribute.
WeightedItemSet This class holds an ordered set of weighted items.
 

Exception Summary
CannotCallMethodException This exception reports a all to a method that cannot be called at that moment.
FileFormatException This exception reports the readinf of an invalid (syntatically incorrect) file.
